mapper.insert: insert into ls_task (description, desc_imgs, issuer_id, publish_time, deadline, create_time) values (#{description}, #{descImgs}, #{issuerId}, #{publishTime}, #{deadline}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update ls_task set finish_time = #{finishTime}, finish_user_id = #{finishUserId}, finish_imgs = #{finishImgs}, case_id = #{caseId}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
